item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。英伟达（Nvidia）仍是市场关注的焦点、提高资本利得税的计划以及本周最重要的就业报告。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Nvidia stays in the limelight, a plan to raise capital gains taxes and this week’s all important jobs report. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 流动性压力加剧，碧桂园房屋销售下滑 57
item.description: 碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co.’s sales slump dragged on in August, exacerbating the Chinese developer’s liquidity woes as it battles a wind-up petition.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司债权人将起草自己的拯救计划
item.description: 泰晤士河水务公司的债权人将开始制定自己的方案，以拯救这家陷入困境的英国公用事业公司，避免国有化。【原文：Creditors to Thames Water will start work on their own proposal to rescue the beleaguered UK utility firm and avoid nationalization.】

item.title: 复星国际香港项目获得再融资贷款
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，复星国际有限公司已获得一笔 16 亿港元（2.05 亿美元）的银团贷款，用于为一个香港房地产项目的现有融资进行部分再融资。【原文：Fosun International Ltd. has secured a HK$1.6 billion ($205 million) syndicated loan to partly refinance an existing facility for a Hong Kong property project, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员称中国人民银行持有的中国政府债券正在被抛售
item.description: 交易员们说，中国央行上周购买的一些中国政府债券目前正在二级市场上出售，这可能表明中国政府正在再次进行干预，以抑制债务反弹。【原文：Some Chinese government bonds that the nation’s central bank bought last week are now being sold in the secondary market, traders said, a possible sign that authorities are once again intervening to curb the debt rally.】

item.title: 前台北市长柯文哲在财产交易调查中被拘留
item.description: 台湾人民党创始人柯文哲因其担任台北市长期间的一个房地产重建项目的腐败调查而被拘留。【原文：Ko Wen-je, founder of the Taiwan People’s Party, has been detained amid a corruption investigation into a property redevelopment project from when he was Taipei mayor.】

item.title: 欧洲为纳米比亚的绿色转型认捐 3700 万欧元
item.description: 欧盟和非洲大陆的其他合作伙伴承诺为纳米比亚向清洁燃料过渡提供 3,690 万欧元（4,090 万美元）的资金，其中包括非洲国家计划开发的绿色氢能项目。【原文：The European Union and other partners on the continent pledged €36.9 million ($40.9 million) in funding for Namibia’s transition to cleaner fuels including green-hydrogen projects the African nation plans to develop.】

item.title: 尽管原油价格上涨，但马来西亚国家石油公司上半年利润下降
item.description: 马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd.）上半年净收入下降了 19%，原因是税收增加和资产规模缩小。【原文：Malaysia’s national oil company Petroliam Nasional Bhd. posted a 19% decline in first-half net income due to higher taxes and a shrinking of its asset base.】

item.title: 借贷成本下降，多伦多房屋销售走高
item.description: 由于较低的利率吸引了更多买家入市，多伦多 8 月份的房屋销售量略有上升。【原文：Toronto home sales rose slightly in August as lower rates pulled more buyers into the market.】

item.title: 曾预告下调存款准备金率的中国人民银行官员认为有再次放松的空间
item.description: 中国央行的一位官员在评论中表示，降低贷款人必须保留的货币储备额度仍是今年的工作重点。【原文：China’s central bank has signaled that lowering the amount of money lenders must keep in reserve remains on the table this year, in comments by an official with a track record of telegraphing such moves.】

item.title: 香港最大的开发商在经济衰退中利润下降 9
item.description: 新鸿基地产有限公司连续第三年公布利润下降，原因是香港房地产不景气给这家香港最大的开发商带来了压力。【原文：Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd. posted lower profit for a third straight year as Hong Kong’s real estate slump weighed on the city’s biggest developer.】

item.title: 中国企业债券利差增至一年来最宽
item.description: 随着投资者纷纷涌入中国主权债务市场，中国公司债券的利差已扩大到一年来的最大值。【原文：Spreads for Chinese corporate notes have widened to the most in a year as investors piled into the nation’s sovereign debt market.】

item.title: CVC Capital 认为 "选择性 "并购仍有拓展空间
item.description: CVC Capital Partners Plc 首席执行官罗布-卢卡斯（Rob Lucas）表示，CVC Capital Partners Plc 有选择性收购的余地，因为它希望扩大其作为一家多领域私募股权投资公司的服务范围。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc has room to pursue selective acquisitions as it looks to expand its offerings as a multistrategy private equity firm, according to Chief Executive Officer Rob Lucas.】

item.title: 据说阿达尼集团计划出售 15 亿美元的美元债券
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的企业集团正在与全球银行洽谈通过出售美元债券筹集至少 15 亿美元，这进一步表明该集团已从做空者的攻击中反弹。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s conglomerate is in talks with global banks to raise at least $1.5 billion through dollar bond sales, a further indicator of the group’s rebound from a short seller attack.】

item.title: 如何衡量对冲基金交易员的技能
item.description:
投资组合经理的 "金钱游戏"。【原文：

Moneyball for portfolio managers.

】

item.title: 对冲基金如何发掘下一位超级交易员
item.description:
如何区分技巧和运气。【原文：

How to distinguish between skill and luck.

】

item.title: 德国工会在大众汽车冲突中发出让步和罢工信号
item.description: 德国最大的工会表示，它愿意考虑缩短大众汽车公司员工的工作周，在这家汽车制造商权衡前所未有的工厂关闭之际，该工会提供了一个可能至关重要的让步。【原文：Germany’s biggest union said it’s willing to consider a shorter work week for Volkswagen AG employees, offering a potentially crucial concession as the carmaker weighs unprecedented plant closures.】

item.title: 美国收购陷入困境，新日铁仍在探索下一步行动
item.description: 新日本钢铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp. ）斥资 141 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp. ）的交易周四濒临破裂，美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）准备阻止该交易，此举将使日本巨头寻求其他增长选择，而东京官员则在研究该交易对这两个盟国的外交影响。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp.’s $14.1 billion takeover of United States Steel Corp. was on the verge of collapse on Thursday with US President Joe Biden preparing to block the deal, a move that will leave the Japanese giant hunting for alternative growth options and Tokyo officials examining the diplomatic implications for the two allies.】

item.title: 英国 ABF 称食糖价格下滑后利润将下降
item.description: 英国联合食品公司（Associated British Foods Plc）警告说，在国际糖价下跌后，其糖业务的利润将低于预期。【原文：Associated British Foods Plc warned it will make less profit than expected from its sugar business after international prices dropped.】

item.title: 挪威人的请病假率达到15年来的最高水平
item.description: 第二季度请病假的挪威人比过去15年任何时候都多，这可能会对劳动力市场和福利国家的资金构成威胁。【原文：More Norwegians called in sick from work in the second quarter than at any other time in the past 15 years in what may pose a risk to the labor market and funding the welfare state.】

item.title: 瑞典计划减税 17.5 亿美元帮助家庭
item.description: 瑞典政府将在 2025 年削减所得税，以刺激因物价上涨和借贷成本增加而购买力下降的家庭。【原文：Sweden’s government will cut income taxes in 2025 in a boost for households that have seen their purchasing power eroded by rising prices and borrowing costs.】

item.title: 散户投资者连续抛售日本股票，创 5 月以来最长纪录
item.description: 继 8 月初日本股市创下 1987 年以来最糟糕的一天之后，散户投资者连续第四周抛售日本股票，创下三个月来最长的连跌记录。【原文：Retail investors dumped Japanese stocks for a fourth consecutive week, the longest losing streak in three months, after the nation’s equities suffered the worst day since 1987 in early August.】

item.title: 泰国股市随泰铢反弹，新内阁提振市场情绪
item.description: 泰国股市攀升至去年 3 月以来的最高点，泰铢在新政府成立后因政策连续性信号而反弹。【原文：Thai stocks climbed the most since March last year, with the baht rallying on policy continuity signals after the formation of a new government.】

item.title: 就业数据公布前经济增长忧虑加重，欧洲股市下滑
item.description: 在备受关注的就业数据公布之前，对美国经济衰退风险和中国经济增长放缓的担忧打压了市场情绪，欧洲股市走低。【原文：European stocks edged lower as worries over the risk of a US recession and slowing growth in China weighed on sentiment ahead of a closely-watched jobs data release.】

item.title: 中国在数据和药品进口调查中拘留阿斯利康员工
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国警方拘留了英国制药商阿斯利康公司的五名现任和前任员工，就其可能从事的非法活动进行讯问。【原文：Police in China have detained five current and former employees of British drugmaker AstraZeneca Plc for questioning about potential illegal activities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 私募股权投资巨头 CVC 前六个月融资 74 亿欧元
item.description: CVC Capital Partners Plc 在今年上半年筹集了 74 亿欧元（约合 82 亿美元）资金，这是这家欧洲著名私募股权公司作为上市公司发布的首份财报。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc raised €7.4 billion ($8.2 billion) in capital in the first six months of this year, according to the European marquee private equity firm’s first set of earnings as a listed company.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气连续三天下跌后逼近超卖区
item.description: 由于对近期供应的担忧有所缓解，欧洲天然气在连续三天下跌后徘徊在超卖区域附近。【原文：European natural gas hovered near oversold territory following three days of declines, as worries about near-term supplies ease.】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服进军人工智能，为科技发展铺平道路
item.description: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服集团公司推出了一揽子人工智能服务，这是该公司在政府多年打压之后寻求新的增长途径。【原文：Jack Ma-backed Ant Group Co. rolled out a package of artificial intelligence services, as the company seeks new avenues of growth following a multiyear government crackdown.】

item.title: 美银美林称欧洲电子债券交易日渐兴盛
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，随着行业创新竞争的白热化，欧洲的电子固定收益交易量正在回升。【原文：Electronic fixed-income trading volumes are picking up in Europe as industry competition to innovate heats up, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车因关税拖累、电动汽车普及缓慢而收回目标
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Car AB）缩减了其前景展望，理由是贸易紧张局势日益加剧，关税对其部分中国制造车型造成了损害。【原文：Volvo Car AB scaled back its outlook, citing growing trade tensions with tariffs hurting some of its models that are made in China.】
